name: Auver
description:
Auver is a short first-person horror experience.

The game follows the story of Suzanne Auver, a once successful painter whose life was forever changed when her sister went missing. Blaming herself for her sister's disappearance, Suzanne becomes obsessed with finding her and uncovering the truth behind the mysterious event.

As the player, you will take on the role of Suzanne as she delves deeper into her nightmares in search of clues. The game is set in a dark and eerie environment. You must use stealth and think outside the box to evade the terrifying creatures and uncover the secrets hidden within the nightmares.

The game features a unique and immersive atmosphere, with intense and fast-paced gameplay, forcing you to make quick decisions in order to survive. With a variety of puzzles and clues to discover, the game will keep you guessing until the very end.



Do you have what it takes to survive the nightmares and find the truth behind Suzanne's sister's disappearance?
